snippet.title: Quintus and the Absent Truth Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Quintus and the Absent Truth on Steam @ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1366700/Quintus_and_the_Absent_Truth__Chapter_One/

Official Website: https://www.wrecktangles.com/qatat

When Darkness Takes Over Your Life. Only One Mouse Can Light The Way.

Alan Shaw is struggling to find his Daughter, Lydia, to find her he needs help from his closest friend, Quintus, an intelligent little mouse.

Delve deep into Alan's life as you discover a twisting story that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Armed with his best friend, Quintus can help you solve puzzles that only a little mouse can help with, and reach areas that only a small character can reach.

Help Alan and Quintus as they push through the darkness to find Lydia and discover the Absent Truth.
